title: Council Decision of 21 January 2008 appointing the Irish member of the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training
header:
25.1.2008 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 19/2
COUNCIL DECISION
of 21 January 2008
appointing the Irish member of the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training
(2008/C 19/02)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EEC) No 337/75 of 10 February 1975 establishing the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training, and in particular Article 4 thereof (1),
Having regard to the nomination submitted by the Irish Government,
Whereas:
(1) By its Decision of 18 September 2006 (2), the Council appointed the members of the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training for the period from 18 September 2006 to 17 September 2009.
(2) A member's seat on the Governing Board of the Centre in the category of Employers' representatives has become vacant as a result of the resignation of Ms Jenny HAYES.
(3) The Irish member of the Governing Board of the aforementioned Centre should be appointed for the remainder of the current term of office, which expires on 17 September 2009,
main_body:
The following person is hereby appointed member of the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training for the remainder of the term of office, which runs until 17 September 2009:
I.   EMPLOYERS' REPRESENTATIVE
Ireland: Mr Tony DONOHOE
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 January 2008.
For the Council
The President
I. JARC
(1)  OJ L 39, 13.2.1975, p. 1. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 2051/2004 (OJ L 355, 1.12.2004, p. 1).
(2)  OJ C 240, 5.10.2006, p. 1.
